description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(572).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,574,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[572], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[-(x^7 - 23 x^6 + 24 x^5 - 263 x^4 - 287 x^3 - 263 x^2 - 24 x - 23)/(x^8 - 574 x^4 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 16 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
